description: Premium APIs from IBM's Environmental Intelligence Service (EIS).

parameters.name: elevation
parameters.description:
Optional parameter, value interpretation is dependent on the ‘units’ parameter.
- Range (English): English units range from -1,500 feet to 30,000 feet, inclusive.
- Range (Metric): Metric units range from -500 meters to 9,000 meters, inclusive. Allow for one decimal place in any units.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
Single value representing the height AGL being requested, in units consistent with the request. Format in decimal up to 1 unit of decimal precision. Units (e,m)
Range (English): >=33 and <= 853 feet
Range (Metric): >= 10 meters and <= 260 meters

parameters.name: landuse
parameters.description: Landuse of the target point where land=1, water=0

parameters.name: units
parameters.description:
The unit of measure for the response. The following values are supported:
e = English units
m = Metric units

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the response (“json”)

parameters.name: geocode
parameters.description: The geocode is listed in order of latitude and longitude (ex. 34.53,-84.50)

- Range (Metric): Metric units range from -500 meters to 9,000 meters, inclusive. Allow for one decimal place in any units.

parameters.name: soilDepth
parameters.description:
Single value representing the depth below surface that is being requested, in units consistent with the request. Format in decimal up to 1 unit of decimal precision. Units (e,m)
- Range (English): <= 80 inches
- Range (Metric): <= 200 centimeters

name: IBM Environmental Intelligence Service (EIS) Premium APIs

parameters.name: Accept-Encoding: gzip
parameters.description: All requests to the API’s should request that the response be compressed. Unless noted otherwise; the only supported encoding format is: gzip
